content: so this is the pattern for my design the minima listic cat as you may have predicted you can use any yarn and colour you want i use the yarn tilda from *svarta fåret* and needle size 2 5 it s a thin yarn and using that with the mentioned needle will make the cat about 14 centimeters high ears included and - i use needle size 2 0 for the tail just to make it slimmer you do as you wish cat away
